overview: Rocco Poindexter, III  -- Pimp of the Year -- gets stranded in rural Arkansas with his girlfriend after his car stalls. Their invitation to stay in a secluded cabin in the woods interrupts a couple of bumbling stoners' plans to party, so they sneak into the local funeral home with a secret jar of reanimation juice and sick the undead ghouls on Rocco and his woman for revenge.
title: The Pimp and the Dead
